channel.title: [Delta] How to change the equip on an item. [317]
channel.description: So its been awhile since ive coded anything, and my friends wanted me to do a throwback server, so i said sure. So now im stuck trying to remember how to make an item equip as a cape or necklace as opposed to a weapon. Any help is much appreciated. Thanks! --Star

item.title: [Delta] How to change the equip on an item. [317]

Thats what I tried, but its still not working.

item.title: [Delta] How to change the equip on an item. [317]
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:3, topic:519921”][quote author=mista pnut link=topic=638415.msg4303323#msg4303323 date=1369354839]
itemHandler
[/quote]
It’s Item.java.[/quote]This, just add the item id under the correct category, it should state which items go where.
